title: Scam Detection
description: Develop your digital defense skills to identify and avoid scams in the Web3 space. Learn to spot red flags, protect your assets, and help others stay safe.

modules.title: Scam Fundamentals

lessons.title: What is a Scam?
lessons.content:
Scams in Web3 are sophisticated attempts to steal assets, personal information, or access to accounts. Understanding their patterns is crucial for protection.

**Scam Definition:**
‚Ä¢ Deceptive practices
‚Ä¢ Asset theft attempts
‚Ä¢ Information harvesting
‚Ä¢ Access compromise
‚Ä¢ Social engineering

**Common Scam Types:**
‚Ä¢ Phishing (fake websites)
‚Ä¢ Social engineering (manipulation)
‚Ä¢ Pump and dump (market manipulation)
‚Ä¢ Rug pulls (project abandonment)
‚Ä¢ Impersonation (fake identities)

**Why Scams Work:**
‚Ä¢ Human psychology
‚Ä¢ FOMO (Fear of Missing Out)
‚Ä¢ Greed and opportunity
‚Ä¢ Trust exploitation
‚Ä¢ Technical ignorance

**Financial Red Flags:**
